DOC.brief_summary: Primary: To compare the efficacy of TACE and TAIE. Secondary: To compare the side effects of TACE and TAIE. The outcome measurements include survival benefit and tumour regression induced by the two therapies.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study of the Efficacy of Transcatheter Arterial Chemoembolization (TACE) and Transcatheter Arterial Pegylated Interferon Embolization (TAIE) for Liver Cancer
DOC.criteria: Confirmed hepatocellular carcinoma not suitable for surgery Portal vein thrombosis Severe arteriovenous shunt Bilirubin level > 50 umol/mL Prothrombin time > 5 seconds
